description:
The main opponent in the first movie.
Makes http://anidb.net/ch13443 [Katsumi Liqueur] aware that she`s "the key" for the http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawks]; forces http://anidb.net/ch25730 [Fuyuka Liqueur] to sacrifice her life in order to seal this LH and save her daughter Katsumi this way.
name: Lucifer Hawk
